description:
Ino decides to challenge herself by participating in the Earth Science Olympiad. It`s her first real step forward as their club president.
As their second semester comes to an end, the club celebrates Christmas and New Year`s together around a warm hot pot followed by star gazing.
Yet as they`re excitedly looking up at the winter diamond, Ao suddenly begins to cry. She says everything`s all right, but...
Source: crunchyroll
